alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 11:32AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Saguache County through 1215 PM MDT... At 1131 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bonanza, or 16 miles southwest of Decker Burn Scar. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saguache. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Pueblo.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft
